T02D2442:64b-1: badzra t'a ki n'i g'i ti n'a ma /
T02D2442:65a-0: @65a * // rdo rje mnga' 'gro ma'i brda'i mgur zhes bya ba /
T02D2442:65a-1: rje btsun ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2442:65a-2: rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas rtogs pa'i lta ba'i brda bstan pa /
T02D2442:65a-3: gser gyi ral gri til dar ldan pa dbyung la //
T02D2442:65a-4: bung pas me tog rtsi bcud ma lus myang par gyis //
T02D2442:65a-5: chu bran sna tshogs pa rgya mtsho gcig go lan tshva'i ro //
T02D2442:65a-6: me long bzhin ni byad yin gud du ma sems
T02D2442:65a-7: cig / chu yi zla ba 'di la byis pa
T02D2442:65a-8: ltad mo byed // bur ma gzugs 'di tha dad snang yang mngar ba'i ro //
T02D2442:65a-9: nam mkha' gzugs su mthong ba'i byis pa snying re rje //
T02D2442:65a-10: ri po rlung gis bskyod du med ba shin tu gces //
T02D2442:65a-11: ta la'i sdong po bregs na mgo rtsa gnyis ka skam //
T02D2442:65a-12: nam mkha'i kha dog rkyen gyis 'gyur ba ngo mtshar che //
T02D2442:65a-13: 'dab chags mkha' la gnas kyang grib mas la rgyu //
T02D2442:65a-14: shel gyi kong bu'i mar me 'di la dri ma med //
T02D2442:65a-15: rmi lam sad pa'i skyes bu 'di ni blo sems bde //
T02D2442:65a-16: gzings la gnas pa'i bya rog gang bder 'gro bar gyis //
T02D2442:65a-17: khang stong nang gi khyi rkun 'di ni ltad mor che //
T02D2442:65a-18: shel la tshon gyis bskus kyang gting nas 'gyur ba med //
T02D2442:65a-19: rang gis bsags pa'i gser la ka 'jis brdar mi dgos //
T02D2442:65a-20: ded dpon lam rgyus can dang 'grogs na nor bu lon //
T02D2442:65a-21: drang srong nags la chud ba 'di ni ngo mtshar che //
T02D2442:65a-22: ku sha rlung gis bsgul ba'i rtsa ba aa re 'khrul //
T02D2442:65a-23: gdeng med gyad kyi spyod pa byed pa snying re rje //
T02D2442:65a-24: sman dug 'dres pa 'di yi gnyis ka'i nus pa nyams //
T02D2442:65a-25: glang po'i gzugs brnyan 'di la khal gyi nus pa med //
T02D2442:65a-26: rin chen snod du gzhug nas 'tsho ba grong du slong //
T02D2442:65a-27: nam mkha' gos su gyon nas 'byung ba gnas su thim //
T02D2442:65a-28: khur bar chu blugs skyes bu de yis smar ma shes //
T02D2442:65a-29: rgyal po'i rjes gnang thob pas gshed ma la mi 'jigs //
T02D2442:65a-30: ral gri'i 'khor los mtshon cha gang yin gtub par byed //
T02D2442:65a-31: 'dab ma gnyis dang ldan pa'i sems can mkha' la 'gro //
T02D2442:65a-32: aa ma mthong ba'i byis pa gzhan gyis 'khrid du med //
T02D2442:65a-33: sa bon rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi nus pa mkha' la bskams //
T02D2442:65a-34: nyi ma mkha' la shar ba'i rgyu skar zil gyis gnon //
T02D2442:65a-35: snying phyung de nas yan lag g-yo ba par ga la nus //
T02D2442:65a-36: mtho yor mi ru shes pas de tshe 'jigs dang bral //
T02D2442:65b-0: @65b sbrul nag mtshon gyis zin na dug gi gnod pa bral //
T02D2442:65b-1: rtsi yi rgyal pos 'bru rnams bcud du sgyur bar byed //
T02D2442:65b-2: rgyal bu pha dgos bzang po 'di la rtsol ba med //
T02D2442:65b-3: dbul po rin chen gling du sna tshogs thabs kyis zhugs //
T02D2442:65b-4: 'thor rlung chen pos stong gsum 'jig rten g-yeng bar byed //
T02D2442:65b-5: dus mtha'i me yis srid gsum sreg par the tshom med //
T02D2442:65b-6: bskal pa'i chu yis snod bcud ma lus gzhi nas 'khru //
T02D2442:65b-9: // / lta ba'i brda rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur /
T02D2442:65b-11: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gros ting 'dzin nyams kyi brda bstan pa /
T02D2442:65b-12: drod gsher ldan pa de chos bon gang ba pa'i dus //
T02D2442:65b-13: sa bon skyed med btab pas myu gu bskyed du sla //
T02D2442:65b-14: gyen thur lam la chu bo 'bab par 'gyur //
T02D2442:65b-15: nags tshal khrod du shing rta 'dren pa'i skyes bu blun //
T02D2442:65b-16: rin chen sna bdun ldan na 'khor los sgyur rgyal rgyu //
T02D2442:65b-17: so ma btang ba'i rdza ni chu la reg pas
T02D2442:65b-18: 'jig / seng ge'i 'o ma snod ngan nang du
T02D2442:65b-19: blugs mi bya // dbul po'i lus 'di dal bar mi bzhag cis kyang bkol //
T02D2442:65b-20: sna tshogs rgyu las sgra snyan 'byung ba ngo mtshar che //
T02D2442:65b-21: zhun sbyong lags pa'i rin chen 'di ni bkol na bde //
T02D2442:65b-22: so mtshams srung ba'i skyes bu 'di la dngul chu blud //
T02D2442:65b-23: nad kyis gdungs par gyur na thur ma gtad par bya //
T02D2442:65b-24: nor bu rin chen rgyal mtshan rtse la phyar nas kyang //
T02D2442:65b-25: mchod ba byas na dgos 'dod sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur //
T02D2442:65b-26: 'a ma srin mos khyer mos khyer ba 'di ni dran gyis la //
T02D2442:65b-27: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas seng ge'i gsob gon nas //
T02D2442:65b-28: nyi zla'i steng du dba' bo'i gdong la blta bar bya //
T02D2442:65b-29: rgyal po'i rkun mo gang yin de ni rtsad bcad nas //
T02D2442:65b-30: gyad kyi nor bu 'di ni thabs kyis btsal bar bya //
T02D2442:65b-31: glang chen smyon pa mi rtse yan du bcug pas srun //
T02D2442:65b-32: chu yi rnyog ma ma bsgul bzhag pas rim gyis dangs //
T02D2442:65b-33: bya ba zin ba'i skyes bu 'di ni blo sems bde //
T02D2442:65b-34: lan tshva'i rdog po 'di la chu'i thigs pa gzan //
T02D2442:65b-35: chab rom nyi mas gdungs pa 'di ni chu ru 'gro //
T02D2442:65b-36: dug la sngags kyis btab pa 'di ni sman gyi
T02D2442:65b-37: mchog / lbu ba chu yin 'di la tha dad
T02D2442:65b-38: yod ma yin // sprin rnams gtor ba'i rlung po 'di la nan tan bskyed //
T02D2442:66a-1: byed med ba'i sgron me bde ba che //
T02D2442:66a-2: chu bo cha dang rtag tu 'grogs pa shin tu gces //
T02D2442:66a-3: 'gro ba bzang mo'i mya ngan 'di ni yid la
T02D2442:66a-4: zhog / nam mkha' yid can 'di ni shar gyi
T02D2442:66a-6: / zhes bsgom pa'i brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur /
T02D2442:66a-8: til gyi sgron me bum pa'i nang du spar bar bya //
T02D2442:66a-9: tshes gcig zla ba 'di ni skyed du rim gyis 'phel //
T02D2442:66a-10: 'gro ba bzang mo rang gi phru gu gso ba mkhas //
T02D2442:66a-11: 'dab chags sgo nga'i ched du gab pa 'di la ltos //
T02D2442:66a-12: chu lud 'dzom pa'i 'bras bu myur du smin //
T02D2442:66a-13: 'tsho byed mkhas pa sman gyi nus pa sna tshogs brten //
T02D2442:66a-14: nags kyi me la rkyen rnams sna tshogs grogs su 'ong //
T02D2442:66a-15: gzhon nu ma yi bde ba khyod kyis smra nus sam //
T02D2442:66a-16: nam mkha'i ri mo 'di la gces par ma 'dzin
T02D2442:66a-17: cig / skyi ser 'di yis chu yi lbu ba
T02D2442:66a-18: dbyings su bdas // nam mkha'i sgron me dus rnams kun du sbar bar bya //
T02D2442:66a-19: dngul gyi me long 'di ni yengs pa med par phyi //
T02D2442:66a-20: ri rab mthon po'i rtse la byin pa 'di ci sems //
T02D2442:66a-21: bung rtsis myos pa 'di yis ci smras smyon pa'i
T02D2442:66a-22: tshig / nad rnams 'byin pa'i sman mchog skran du
T02D2442:66a-23: gyur pa yod // padma'i rtsi bcud 'thungs pa'i bung ba phyir mi lta //
T02D2442:66a-24: shel gyi mchod rten ma mthong bar du lta ba gces //
T02D2442:66a-25: sgron me lag na thogs pa'i skyes bu snang lam bde //
T02D2442:66a-26: khong du seng ge'i snying gis rtag tu brgyal bar 'gyur //
T02D2442:66a-27: gser 'gyur rtsi yis dngos po bzang ngan med par 'joms //
T02D2442:66a-28: chu bo chen po zhon nas nam mkha'i bya lam
T02D2442:66a-29: snyag / chu bo'i rgyun chad de dus rang thag
T02D2442:66a-30: 'khor mi nus // 'khor lo'i srub thag chad pa'i rdza mkhan blo sems bde //
T02D2442:66a-31: sprin gyis nam mkha'i dang las byung zhing de ru dengs //
T02D2442:66a-32: bltas kyi bltas kyi nam mkha' 'di ni mthong ba 'gags /
T02D2442:66a-34: // / nyams kyi brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur //
T02D2442:66a-36: skyes bu nad kyis zin pa'i blo sems dran gyis la //
T02D2442:66a-37: dur khrod wa mo 'di yi spyod 'gros blta bar bya //
T02D2442:66a-38: nags tshal khrod na ri dags dman ma gnas ba ltos //
T02D2442:66a-39: rgyal po'i btsun mo 'di ni su la'ang 'jigs pa med //
T02D2442:66a-40: rdo yi mi la 'gran par nus pa ngo mtshar che //
T02D2442:66a-41: nags na gnas pa'i spre'u 'di yi spyod pa'am //
T02D2442:66b-0: yang na rgyal bu @66b gzhon nu 'di la blta bar bya //
T02D2442:66b-1: mkha' la rgyu ba'i bya bran 'di 'dra ci yi phyir //
T02D2442:66b-2: 'bru yi mdzod du bkres pas nyen pa snying re rje //
T02D2442:66b-3: phye ma leb kyi spyod pa 'di 'dra su yis phod //
T02D2442:66b-4: dong gi btson 'di thar ram yid la bya bar rigs //
T02D2442:66b-5: sdug bsngal rgyan du mthong ba'i glang po sgrog la dga' //
T02D2442:66b-6: mtsho yi nang nas smig rgyu snyag pa'i ri dgas snying re rje //
T02D2442:66b-7: rin chen gling nas stong log byed pa'i ded dpon blun //
T02D2442:66b-8: nam mkha'i rlung dang 'grogs pa phyogs bzhir kun du
T02D2442:66b-9: rgyug / glang chen shugs kyis bag ma tshongs la
T02D2442:66b-10: khyi sha zo // smyon pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas nam mkha' sman mchog ster//
T02D2442:66b-11: nags la gnas pa'i ri dags 'di ni yan par bye //
T02D2442:66b-12: 'dab chags mkha' la rgyu ba 'di yi rkang rjes ltos //
T02D2442:66b-13: ral gri lag na thogs pa'i mi de gang phrad gsod //
T02D2442:66b-14: gyad kyi spyod pa 'di la sems can phra mo
T02D2442:66b-15: skrag / khyi phag gnyis kyis bram ze'i gsang tshig
T02D2442:66b-16: rlung la bskur // mi mgo skam bo la ni shing gi skyes bu dga' //
T02D2442:66b-17: gyi ling sgrog dang bral na kun du rgyug par rigs //
T02D2442:66b-18: kha ba'i nus pa mtsho la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2442:66b-19: shing lo rlung gis khyer ba 'di yi rtsad mi chod //
T02D2442:66b-20: nyi zla lta bur gyur na skar ma'i tshogs dang 'grogs //
T02D2442:66b-21: gru pa 'di yis skya pa nya ra bya bar rigs //
T02D2442:66b-22: dug 'di rma bya'i zas yin gzhan rnams phung bar byed //
T02D2442:66b-23: 'dab gshog med par mkha' la 'gro ba dor bar bya /
T02D2442:66b-25: // / spyod pa'i brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur //
T02D2442:66b-27: shel sgong yongs su dag na 'od zer nang nas 'char //
T02D2442:66b-28: nam mkha'i gter la spyod pa'i skyes bu dbul dang bral //
T02D2442:66b-29: snying gi dbus su padma'i ge sar smin par sla //
T02D2442:66b-30: drod tshad ldan pa'i 'o ma rtsol bas mar du 'gyur //
T02D2442:66b-31: stong pa'i snod 'di nam chag tshe nam mkha' 'dres //
T02D2442:66b-32: 'ja' tshon dus kyi mkha' la yal ba rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D2442:66b-33: nam mkha'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'di 'dra ngo mtshar che //
T02D2442:66b-34: 'khor los sgyur rgyal sna tshogs gnas nas bsdu ba mdzad //
T02D2442:66b-35: rgun 'brum 'bras bu bsgul bas mi smin bzhag na smin //
T02D2442:66b-36: nor bu yon tan sus byin 'di yi bsam pa ci //
T02D2442:66b-37: nyi zla mkha' la 'char ba 'di la rnam rtog med //
T02D2442:66b-38: stong pa'i cho 'phrul 'di yis lo tog 'bras bu smin //
T02D2442:67a-1: dbyings 'di sna tshogs ston pa gang gi rkyen //
T02D2442:67a-2: chu snod du ma'i zla ba'i gzugs brnyan shes par gyis /
T02D2442:67a-6: mkha' 'gro ma'i brda bam po lnga ba zhes bya
T02D2442:67a-7: ba gsang mdzod na shog dril du gam ba las
T02D2442:67a-8: / dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyis bka' bgros nas rje dam pa rgya gar la gnang /
T02D2442:67a-9: slad kyi ding ri zla 'khor du zha ma lo
T02D2442:67a-10: ts'a bas bsgyur nas bla ma byang chub sems dpa'
